price: Akasema: Teremkeni! Mtakuwa nyinyi kwa nyinyi maadui. Na kwenye ardhi itakuwa ndio makao yenu na starehe yenu mpaka ufike muda.
arabic: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطُواْ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akawaambia wao na pia na Shetani: Teremkeni nyote nyinyi, mtakuwa maadui nyinyi kwa nyinyi. Makao yenu na starehe yenu kwa muda mpaka ifike ajali yenu, yatakuwa katika ardhi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭū baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun walakum fī al-arḍi mus'taqarrun wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
